questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Statue and architecture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) Architectural detail on a building

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A statue on a building
B) A group of people
C) A natural landscape
D) A street performance

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A statue
C) A person
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) A building with windows
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A lake
B) A street
C) A statue
D) A playground

What is the relationship between the statue and the building?
A) The statue is part of the building's design
B) The statue is placed in front of the building
C) The statue is unrelated to the building
D) The statue is inside the building

What material is the statue likely made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Stone
D) Glass

What architectural style does the building represent?
A) Modern
B) Gothic
C) Classical
D) Baroque

What is the posture of the statue?
A) Sitting
B) Standing with arms crossed
C) Running
D) Lying down

What additional element is included in the statue?
A) A bird
B) A book
C) A ram
D) A sword

What is the texture of the building's exterior?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Wooden
D) Metallic

How is the statue integrated into the building?
A) It is freestanding in front of the building
B) It is embedded into the corner of the building
C) It is hanging from the roof
D) It is placed on a pedestal beside the building

What is the color of the building?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Beige
D) Green

What is the architectural feature at the base of the statue?
A) A pedestal
B) A fountain
C) A bench
D) A plaque

What is the architectural style of the windows?
A) Gothic
B) Modern
C) Classical
D) Baroque

What is the primary material of the building?
A) Brick
B) Wood
C) Concrete
D) Stone

What is the color of the statue?
A) Bronze
B) Gold
C) Gray
D) White

What kind of maintenance does the statue appear to have?
A) Well-maintained
B) Neglected
C) Recently restored
D) Newly installed

How is the statue positioned in relation to the windows?
A) Directly above a window
B) Between two windows
C) In front of a window
D) Below a window

What type of architectural detail is visible on the building's walls?
A) Carvings
B) Paintings
C) Tiles
D) Columns

What is the condition of the building's exterior?
A) Newly painted
B) Weathered
C) Under construction
D) Covered in graffiti

What is the relationship between the statue and the ram?
A) The ram is a pet
B) The ram is a symbolic element
C) The ram is a separate sculpture
D) The ram is an offering

What is the statue depicted in the photo doing?
A) Running
B) Standing with arms crossed
C) Sitting
D) Holding a book

What animal is part of the statue?
A) A lion
B) A ram
C) A dog
D) An eagle

What type of windows are visible on the building?
A) Circular
B) Arched
C) Rectangular
D) Triangular
